thought: To craft green_stained_glass, I need to craft 8 glass blocks. I currently have 8 sand blocks in my inventory, which can be smelted into glass blocks. Therefore, I will smelt one sand block from slot 29 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 29 to slot 12 with quantity 1
